text:
Wilton Lewis Felder (August 31, 1940 – September 27, 2015) was an American jazz musician. He played the saxophone and bass. He is best known as a founding member of The Jazz Crusaders, later known as The Crusaders. He was born in Houston, Texas.
Felder died of multiple myeloma on September 27, 2015 in Whittier, California. He was 75.
